text: Plaridel can refer to: *the penname of Marcelo H. del Pilar *Arellano University – Plaridel Campus *J. Plaridel Silvestre, Scouting notable, awardee of the Bronze Wolf in 1977 * The name of three places in the Philippines: **Plaridel, Bulacan **Plaridel, Misamis Occidental **Plaridel, Quezon *Plaridel Airport
title: Plaridel
